ygData.subject: guild
ygData.msgSnippet: i like the idea of advertizing a gblt guild in a publication! that way we can have the guild on more than one server like the talons of the elite. (and that
ygData.messageBody:
i like the idea of advertizing a gblt guild in a publication! that way
we can have the guild on more than one server like the talons of the
elite. (and that way i dont have to ditch out on my RL friends on teh
bristlebane server) i know you say split your time but i already have 8
characters so i am splitting my time between too many characters as it
is i couldnt handle haveing them on more than one server!!!! well like i
said if it is needed i will make a temp character so we can get the
guild made just let me know



Your friendly nighborhood homo
Jose AKA Redspider
